name: An Exploration into the Behaviour of Rolling Dice
name_original: An Exploration into the Behaviour of Rolling Dice
description:
A short puzzle game about moving dice around. 

Move the dice to the right place with the correct side facing up (and sometimes in the right orientation too).

Controls:

W A S D: Roll the dice

U: Undo

If you're stuck, you can roll the dice using the spacebar. All levels can be completed without using this feature, but it might help if you get stuck.

Hope it's not too easy/hard. Try to solve them in as few moves as possible!

Made in 48H for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

Programming by Farrell

Art and Sound from kenney.nl

(Chrome or the downloadable versions are preferred. Seems to be buggy on Safari.)
